meanings.definition: A malignant tumor of the placenta.
meanings.sent1: The doctors diagnosed her with choriocarcinomas.
meanings.sent2: The choriocarcinomas were detected during the ultrasound.
meanings.sent3: The choriocarcinomas decided to throw a party in the placenta.
meanings.sent4: Her choriocarcinomas spread like wildfire, consuming everything in their path.
meanings.sent5: The choriocarcinomas in her placenta were like tiny time bombs, ready to explode.

meanings.definition: A type of cancer that develops from trophoblastic cells.
meanings.sent1: The researchers studied the origins of choriocarcinomas.
meanings.sent2: Choriocarcinomas can be challenging to treat effectively.
meanings.sent3: The trophoblastic cells in the choriocarcinomas had a dance-off.
meanings.sent4: Her choriocarcinomas were like rebellious teenagers, refusing to follow the rules.
meanings.sent5: The trophoblastic cells in the choriocarcinomas multiplied rapidly, causing concern.

meanings.definition: Choriocarcinomas are rare but highly aggressive.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that choriocarcinomas are aggressive tumors.
meanings.sent2: Dealing with choriocarcinomas requires a specialized medical team.
meanings.sent3: The choriocarcinomas challenged the other tumors to a race.
meanings.sent4: Her choriocarcinomas were like fierce warriors, fighting against all odds.
meanings.sent5: The rare choriocarcinomas posed a significant threat to her health.
